summary: The diff clearly implements the sticky in-page navigation and the Home hero (headline, description, CTAs, and trust panel) plus a brand-themed Tailwind/CSS styling system. However, several required sections/content items (About narrative + trust card, Products exact cards/prices + quality banner, Contact FormSubmit exact hidden fields/redirect, social link exact Instagram URL, the 3-item info strip, and the footer’s exact required lines) cannot be confirmed from the truncated App.tsx. The diff also adds backend and Internet Identity/actor-query infrastructure that was not requested for this marketing site.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build the About section (“Our story & mission”) with the provided narrative text and an adjacent trust highlight card (“100% trusted”).
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx is truncated before the About section content, so the required heading, three narrative paragraphs, and the “100% trusted” aside cannot be verified from the provided diff excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement the Products section showing exactly four category cards: Bags, Toys, Electronics, Clothing; each with an icon, subtitle, and starting price (“from $19/$9/$29/$15”).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt does not include the Products section implementation; therefore the exact set of four cards, subtitles, and starting prices cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the Products section quality banner text: “100% genuine products — fast delivery — easy returns”.
missing_requirements.reason: The Products banner text is not visible in the truncated App.tsx excerpt, so presence of the exact required banner string cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement the Contact section with a functional HTML form that submits to FormSubmit using the exact action URL and hidden fields (_subject, _captcha, _next with exact values).
missing_requirements.reason: The Contact form markup (action URL, POST method, required fields, and hidden fields/values) is not shown in the truncated App.tsx excerpt, so the exact endpoint/hidden fields cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a social links row in Contact including an Instagram button linking to the exact provided URL in a new tab; optional X/Twitter and Facebook placeholders must be safe.
missing_requirements.reason: Although social icon libraries are imported, the actual rendered links (Instagram exact URL, target=_blank, and safe placeholder hrefs for others) are not visible in the truncated App.tsx excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the extra informational strip section as a responsive three-item highlight row (FAQ — fast answers; free shipping over $50; visit our showroom (by appt)).
missing_requirements.reason: The required 3-item informational strip is not visible in the truncated App.tsx excerpt, so its presence and exact text cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement the footer with the 2025 branding line, palette note mentioning #1A4D2E and #F5EFE0, and a note that a logo will be provided later (placeholder for now).
missing_requirements.reason: The footer content is not visible in the truncated App.tsx excerpt, so the required 2025 line, palette note, and logo-placeholder note cannot be verified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a Motoko backend canister (empty actor) even though the build states it should not require backend changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly indicates the marketing site should not require backend changes; the diff adds backend/main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented Internet Identity provider and an authenticated/anonymous actor hook with React Query (application auth/actor infrastructure) even though the marketing landing page requirements do not request authentication or actor usage.
hallucinated_features.reason: The requested functionality is a single-page marketing site with FormSubmit contact form; no login/identity/actor functionality is specified as a requirement.
